name: Easy Jump Links Menus
author: Rafael Dery

sections.description:
Create jump links menus from any HTML tags in your description text in seconds. You only need to specify the target content via a shortcode and place another shortcode anywhere in your content area to display the menu.

Documentation and Demo

Premium Plugins

Check out my premium plugins for WordPress. I also offer a product designer plugin for WooCommerce.
sections.installation:
1. Go to your admin area and select Plugins -> Add new from the menu.
  2. Search for „Easy Jump Links Menus“.
  3. Click install.
  4. Click activate.
